text: (offbeat uplifting music)
- In public sector, our aim
is to improve citizen experience.
- It's an amazing feeling to work

with the public sector
because you really know

that your projects are
touching people's lives.
- Working with customers

in the public sector
is extremely rewarding,

and has an impact to
each and every one of us.

- By helping our public
sector customers to innovate
and achieve their goals,
we contribute to improving the daily life

of citizens with new
services and capabilities.

- So I get to work on cutting
edge research and innovation

and scientific innovation,
as well as putting people

on Mars and space exploration,
which is very gratifying.

- The thing that makes
me excited about going
to work each day is that I get
to take my technology experience
and apply it to real world problems
that really affect the lives of people.
- What's even more fulfilling is seeing

that our customers are
just as excited as us.

- So what attracted me to
AWS, really the culture.

The philanthropy of Amazon,
the innovation of AWS,
the empowerment that the management

and the leadership gives
individuals all the way down
to the individual contributor level.
- It's a really exciting place.
The culture is one that's very fast paced,
but it's very energetic.

- What's unique about AWS
and what's really compelling
is the opportunity to learn here,
learn and be curious.
- AWS is built on a culture of trust,

which means I can flex my
hours and my work to be

where I need to be both
personally and professionally.
- At AWS, I have the possibility

of helping our biggest
customers leverage technology

in a way that can really
make a positive difference
in millions of people's lives.
Not many people can say that.
(uplifting music)
